NARR:
MUEZZIN:
(PAUSE)
NARR:
(CONT) A place to stand on and call their own. We
had cast a bell for Philadelphia; the false muezzins
who cry ??Fools,? - forge chains. When the prayers to
Allah are finished â€” to the music of which metal will
the Faithful turn???? (MUSIC OUT)
(ALONE IN FAR B.G.) (FINISHES LONGLY) (TO DEAD SILENCE)
Again the Chairman of the Hoover Institute and Library,
Dr, Harold H. Fisher.
